net.cassite.style

Class Async<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cassite.style.Async<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - function's return type

    public class Async<R>
extends java.lang.Object
    Async supporter.
    the given function will start to run as soon as its constructed.
    Author:
    wkgcass

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R await()
      block current thread and wait until the async task was finished or thrown with an exception.
      void awaitError(def<java.lang.Object> handler)
      Handle exceptions that async task thrown.
      the method would block current thread until async task finished or thrown with an exception, the handling process would be taken in current thread.
      void awaitError(VFunc1<StyleRuntimeException> handler)
      Handle exceptions that async task thrown.
      the method would block current thread until async task finished or thrown with an exception, the handling process would be taken in current thread.
      StyleRuntimeException getErr()
      retrieve exception that this supporter occurred.
      the method will only return exception that's already found.
      java.lang.Thread getThread()
      retrieve the async thread
      boolean hasErrHandler()
      check whether this async supporter has an exception handler
      void onError(def<java.lang.Object> handler)
      Handle exceptions that async task thrown.
      if there's already an exception thrown when this method invoked, the handling process would be taken in current thread.
      Otherwise, the process would be taken at async thread when exception occurred.
      use awaitError(def) if you need to force the handling process taken on current thread.
      void onError(VFunc1<StyleRuntimeException> handler)
      Handle exceptions that async task thrown.
      if there's already an exception thrown when this method invoked, the handling process would be taken in current thread.
      Otherwise, the process would be taken at async thread when exception occurred.
      use awaitError(VFunc1) if you need to force the handling process taken on current thread.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • await

        public R await()
        block current thread and wait until the async task was finished or thrown with an exception.
        Returns:
        the result of the finished async.
        When an exception occurred inside the async task, the result will always be null.

      • getThread

        public java.lang.Thread getThread()
        retrieve the async thread
        Returns:
        the thread that async task run on.

      • onError

        public void onError(VFunc1<StyleRuntimeException> handler)
        Handle exceptions that async task thrown.
        if there's already an exception thrown when this method invoked, the handling process would be taken in current thread.
        Otherwise, the process would be taken at async thread when exception occurred.
        use awaitError(VFunc1) if you need to force the handling process taken on current thread.
        Parameters:
        handler - a function takes in StyleRuntimeException
        for all Throwable caught from the async task would be packed into StyleRuntimeException
        See Also:
        awaitError(VFunc1), StyleRuntimeException

      • onError

        public void onError(def<java.lang.Object> handler)
        Handle exceptions that async task thrown.
        if there's already an exception thrown when this method invoked, the handling process would be taken in current thread.
        Otherwise, the process would be taken at async thread when exception occurred.
        use awaitError(def) if you need to force the handling process taken on current thread.
        Parameters:
        handler - a function to invoke when occurred an exception
        for all Throwable caught from the async task would be packed into StyleRuntimeException
        See Also:
        awaitError(def), StyleRuntimeException

      • awaitError

        public void awaitError(VFunc1<StyleRuntimeException> handler)
        Handle exceptions that async task thrown.
        the method would block current thread until async task finished or thrown with an exception, the handling process would be taken in current thread.
        Parameters:
        handler - a function takes in StyleRuntimeException
        for all Throwable caught from the async task would be packed into StyleRuntimeException
        See Also:
        StyleRuntimeException

      • awaitError

        public void awaitError(def<java.lang.Object> handler)
        Handle exceptions that async task thrown.
        the method would block current thread until async task finished or thrown with an exception, the handling process would be taken in current thread.
        Parameters:
        handler - a function to invoke when occurred an exception
        for all Throwable caught from the async task would be packed into StyleRuntimeException
        See Also:
        StyleRuntimeException

      • hasErrHandler

        public boolean hasErrHandler()
        check whether this async supporter has an exception handler
        Returns:
        true if this async supporter has an exception handler, false otherwise

      • getErr

        public StyleRuntimeException getErr()
        retrieve exception that this supporter occurred.
        the method will only return exception that's already found. It will not guarantee exception won't occur after invoking this method.
        Returns:
        occurred exception.
